name: Summer's Cell

actions.cheer: Woohoo! We found Summer! Now we just gotta get through this force field. I bet there's like, a super useful household object that could help us.

actions.talk: Summer, you gotta watch it. Normal high school kids don't get themselves arrested and put in inter dimensional prison!

features.description: force field blocking access to Summer's cell
features.interactive_text: We gotta find out how to break through the force field!

longform: We found her! Wow, Morty, I can't beleive we actually did it.
shortform: We found her! Can we go home yet?
long_description_exit: This place reminds me of Time Prison. You know what they do to three dimensional life forms there? Same thing they do in every other prison, only forever.
short_description_exit: Morty, we've got-gotta get out of here before someone recognizes me.
